thread.title: Sprint Plans to Sit Out Next U.S. Auction of Airwaves
thread.title_full: Sprint Plans to Sit Out Next U.S. Auction of Airwaves - WSJ

author: Ryan Knutson
title: Sprint Plans to Sit Out Next U.S. Auction of Airwaves
text:
Sprint Corp. said it plans to sit out a coming auction of wireless airwaves, a surprising decision that will save the carrier billions of dollars but could deprive its network of upgrades in the future.
The Federal Communications Commission has scheduled a major auction for March 2016. The government plans to buy airwaves from TV broadcasters which it will then resell to wireless carriers.
Sprint said its airwaves at present...
